title: Private Entrance, Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool, Late Fee Forgiveness
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Laundry Facility', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Private Entrance', '-Additional Storage', '-Package Acceptance', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
